properties.Description: The base class for a backup policy. Workload-specific backup policies are derived from this class.

protectedItemsCount.Description: The number of items associated with this policy.

schedulePolicy.Description: The backup schedule specified as part of backup policy.

retentionPolicy.Description: The retention policy with the details on backup copy retention ranges.

backupManagementType.Description: This property is used as the discriminator for deciding the specific types in the polymorphic chain of types.

schedulePolicyType.Description: This property is used as the discriminator for deciding the specific types in the polymorphic chain of types.

scheduleRunFrequency.Description: Defines the frequency interval (daily or weekly) for the schedule policy.

scheduleRunDays.Description: This list is the days of the week when the schedule runs.

scheduleRunTimes.Description: List of times, during a day, when the schedule runs.

scheduleWeeklyFrequency.Description: The number of times per week the schedule runs.

schedulePolicyType.Description: This property is used as the discriminator for deciding the specific types in the polymorphic chain of types.

dailySchedule.Description: Daily retention schedule of the backup policy.

weeklySchedule.Description: Weekly retention schedule of the backup policy.

monthlySchedule.Description: Monthly retention schedule of the backup policy.

yearlySchedule.Description: Yearly retention schedule of the backup policy.

retentionPolicyType.Description: This property is used as the discriminator for deciding the specific types in the polymorphic chain of types.

retentionTimes.Description: The retention times of retention policy.

retentionDuration.Description: The retention duration of retention policy.

count.Description:
Count of the duration types. Retention duration is determined by the combining the Count times and durationType. 
   For example, if Count = 3 and durationType = Weeks, then the retention duration is three weeks.

durationType.Description: The retention duration type of the retention policy.

daysOfTheWeek.Description: List of the days of the week for the weekly retention policy.

retentionTimes.Description: Retention times of the retention policy.

retentionScheduleFormatType.Description: Retention schedule format type for monthly retention policy.

retentionScheduleDaily.Description: Daily retention format for the monthly retention policy.

retentionScheduleWeekly.Description: Weekly retention format for the monthly retention policy.

retentionTimes.Description: Retention times of the retention policy.

retentionDuration.Description: Retention duration of the retention policy.

daysOfTheMonth.Description: List of days of the month.

daysOfTheWeek.Description: List of days of the week.

weeksOfTheMonth.Description: List of weeks of the month.

retentionScheduleFormatType.Description: Retention schedule format for the yearly retention policy.

monthsOfYear.Description: List of the months of year for the yearly retention policy.

retentionScheduleDaily.Description: Daily retention format for the yearly retention policy.

retentionScheduleWeekly.Description: Weekly retention format for the yearly retention policy.

retentionTimes.Description: Retention times for the retention policy.

retentionDuration.Description: Retention duration for the retention policy.
Retention duration of the protection policy.

retentionPolicyType.Description: This property is used as the discriminator for deciding the specific types in the polymorphic chain of types.

backupManagementType.Description: This property is used as the discriminator for deciding the specific types in the polymorphic chain of types.

schedulePolicy.Description: The schedule specified in the backup policy.

retentionPolicy.Description: The details specified in the Retention policy.

backupManagementType.Description: This property is used as the discriminator for deciding the specific types in the polymorphic chain of types.

properties.Description: The base class for backup items.

backupManagementType.Description: The backup management type associated with the backup item.

workloadType.Description: The workload type for this item.

sourceResourceId.Description: The ID of the resource to be backed up.

policyId.Description: The ID of the backup policy associated with this backup item.

lastRecoveryPoint.Description: The timestamp when the most recent backup copy was created for this backup item.

friendlyName.Description: The friendly name of the VM represented by this backup item.

virtualMachineId.Description: The fully qualified Resource Manager ID of the virtual machine represented by this item.

protectionStatus.Description: The backup status of this backup item.

protectionState.Description: The backup state of this backup item.

lastBackupStatus.Description: The last backup operation status. The possible values are: Healthy or Unhealthy.

lastBackupTime.Description: The timestamp of the last backup operation for this backup item.

extendedInfo.Description: Additional information for this backup item.

oldestRecoveryPoint.Description: The oldest backup copy available for this backup item.

recoveryPointCount.Description: The number of backup copies available for this backup item.

policyInconsistent.Description: Specifies if the backup policy associated with the backup item is inconsistent.

friendlyName.Description: The friendly name of the VM represented by this backup item.

virtualMachineId.Description: The fully qualified Resource Manager ID of the virtual machine represented by this item.

protectionStatus.Description: The backup status of this backup item.

protectionState.Description: The backup state of this backup item.

lastBackupStatus.Description: The last backup operation status. The possible values are: Healthy or Unhealthy.

lastBackupTime.Description: The timestamp of the last backup operation for this backup item.

extendedInfo.Description: Additional information for this backup item.

friendlyName.Description: The friendly name of this backup item.

computerName.Description: The name of the computer associated with this backup item.

lastBackupStatus.Description: The status of last backup operation.

protectionState.Description: The states for this property are: Protected, ProtectionStopped, IRPending, or ProtectionError.

extendedInfo.Description: Additional information for this backup item.

lastRefreshedAt.Description: The last day and time the agent synced with the service.

recoveryPointCount.Description: The number of backup copies associated with the backup item.

protectedItemDataId.Description: The internal ID of a backup item. The internal ID is used by the Azure SQL Backup engine to contact Recovery Services.

protectionState.Description: The backup state of the backup item.

extendedInfo.Description: Additional information for this backup item.

oldestRecoveryPoint.Description: The oldest backup copy available for this item in the service.

recoveryPointCount.Description: The number of available backup copies for this backup item.

policyState.Description: The state of the backup policy associated with this backup item.

properties.Description: The base class for a backup policy. Workload-specific backup policies are derived from this class.
The base class for a container with backup items. Containers with specific workloads are derived from this class.

backupManagementType.Description: The backup management type for the container.

registrationStatus.Description: The container's registration status with the Recovery Services vault.

healthStatus.Description: The status of the container's health.

containerType.Description:
The type assigned to the container. The values to use for each of these properties are:
1. Compute Azure VM is Microsoft.Compute/virtualMachines
2. Classic Compute Azure VM is Microsoft.ClassicCompute/virtualMachines
3. Windows machines (like Azure Backup Server and DPM) is Windows
4. Azure SQL instance is AzureSqlContainer.

protectableObjectType.Description: The protectable object type associated with the container.

virtualMachineId.Description: The fully qualified Resource Manager URL of the virtual machine represented by this Azure IaaS VM container.

virtualMachineVersion.Description: Specifies whether the container represents a classic or a Resource Manager-deployed virtual machine.

resourceGroup.Description: The resource group name associated with the Recovery Services vault.

protectableObjectType.Description: The protectable object type associated with the container.

virtualMachineId.Description: The fully qualified Resource Manager URL of the virtual machine represented by this Azure IaaS VM container.

virtualMachineVersion.Description: Specifies whether the container represents a classic or a Resource Manager-deployed virtual machine.

resourceGroup.Description: The resource group name associated with the Recovery Services vault.

protectableObjectType.Description: The protectable object type associated with the container.

canReRegister.Description: The container can be registered one more time.

protectedItemCount.Description: The number of backup items in the container.

agentVersion.Description: The version of the agent used with this container.

protectableObjectType.Description: The protectable object type associated with the container.

lastRefreshedAt.Description: The time stamp when this container was refreshed.

backupItemType.Description: The type of backup items associated with this container.

backupItems.Description: The list of backup items associated with this container.

policyName.Description: The backup policy associated with this container.

lastBackupStatus.Description: The latest backup status of this container.

properties.Description: The base class for a container with backup items. Containers with specific workloads are derived from this class.
The base class for backup copies. Workload-specific backup copies are derived from this class.

friendlyName.Description: Friendly name of the backup copy.

recoveryPointTime.Description: The time when this backup copy was created.

recoveryPointAdditionalInfo.Description: Additional information associated with this backup copy.

objectType.Description: This property is used as the discriminator for deciding the specific types in the polymorphic chain of types.

recoveryPointTime.Description: The date and time when the backup copy was created.

recoveryPointAdditionalInfo.Description: Additional information associated with this backup copy.

sourceVMStorageType.Description: The storage type for the VM whose backup copy was created.

isSourceVMEncrypted.Description: Identifies whether the VM was encrypted when the backup copy is created.

keyAndSecret.Description: Required details for recovering an encrypted VM. Applicable only when IsSourceVMEncrypted is true.

isInstantILRSessionActive.Description: Answer to the question - Is the session to recover items from this backup copy still active.

objectType.Description: This property is used as the discriminator for deciding the specific types in the polymorphic chain of types.

kekDetails.Description: The Key Encryption Key (KEK) is the encryption key for the Bitlocker Encryption Key (BEK).

keyUrl.Description: Key refers to the Key Encryption Key (KEK). The KEK is the Key to unlock the Secret.

keyVaultId.Description: Key Vault ID identifies where the KEK is stored.

keyBackupData.Description: Key Backup Data refers to Key Encryption Key (KEK) data.

secretUrl.Description: Secret refers to Bitlocker Encryption Key (BEK). The Secret can be unlocked by the key (or KEK).

secretVaultId.Description: ID of the Key Vault where this Secret is stored.

properties.Description: The base class for backup items.
Defines workload-agnostic properties for a job.

entityFriendlyName.Description: The friendly name of the entity on which the current job is executing.

backupManagementType.Description: The backup management type for the current job.

duration.Description: The time that elapsed during the execution of this job.

actionsInfo.Description: Gets or sets the state, or actions, applicable on this job. Examples of the actions are: Cancel or Retry.

virtualMachineVersion.Description: Specifies whether the backup item is a Classic VM or a Resource Manager VM.

jobType.Description: This property is the discriminator for deciding between the specific types in the polymorphic chain of types.

errorTitle.Description: Title: typically, the entity associated the error.

recommendations.Description: List of localized recommendations for the error string.

tasksList.Description: List of tasks associated with this job.

progressPercentage.Description: Indicates progress of the job. Null if it has not started or completed.

dynamicErrorMessage.Description: Non-localized error message for job execution.

duration.Description: The time elapsed for the task.

progressPercentage.Description: The progress of the task, as a percentage.

duration.Description: The time elapsed for the job.

dpmServerName.Description: DPM server name managing the backup item or backup job.

containerName.Description: The name of the cluster or server protecting the current backup item, if any.

actionsInfo.Description: The state or actions applicable on this job, such as Cancel or Retry.

jobType.Description: This property is the discriminator for deciding between the specific types in the polymorphic chain of types.

recommendations.Description: The list of localized recommendations for the error string.

tasksList.Description: List of tasks associated with this job.

dynamicErrorMessage.Description: Non-localized error message on job execution.

duration.Description: The time required for the job to run.

actionsInfo.Description: The state or actions applicable on jobs such as Cancel or Retry.

mabServerName.Description: The name of server protecting the data store.

mabServerType.Description: Server type of the Azure Backup Server container.

jobType.Description: This property is the discriminator for deciding between the specific types in the polymorphic chain of types.

tasksList.Description: List of tasks for this job.

dynamicErrorMessage.Description: Non-localized error message specific to this job.
